data.quote: Your present is the most precious thing.
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: Learn to embrace the inevitable.
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: Stop worrying about both the future and the past. Live in today.
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: Leave old mistakes behind and move on.
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: Worrying makes you nervous and tense. This impacts your body functioning too.
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: Analyzing a problem will make you worry less as so you can fix it.
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: Busy yourself with other things. This something else must be constructive. It’s a useful technique because humans can’t think about two things at a time.
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: Don’t worry about small things.
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: Change your mindset and be positive.
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: Always be yourself, regardless of what happens. Don’t ever copy others.
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: Avoid getting even or taking revenge if someone wronged you. Its because hating your enemies only gives them more power. Instead, ignore them and don’t think about them. As General Eisenhower said: don’t waste a second thinking of people you hate.
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: Don’t expect that others will be grateful. It’s because humans often don’t remember showing gratitude. It’s more of a surprise when they’re grateful. Instead, give for the pleasure of giving.
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: Never count your problems. Instead, always count your blessing. This means focusing on the right and good things in your life. You’ll find that almost 90% of your life is going well. So, why focus on the rest of 10%?
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: Focus on being who you are. Avoid trying to become someone else. Each person is unique. So, regardless of the situations, be yourself. Don’t copy others. Instead, find and stick to your real self.
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: Use prayer, no matter what your religious background is. This will help keep you inspired. Prayer will help you give voice to what’s troubling you. You’ll feel as if you’re sharing your problems and aren’t alone. Hence, you’ll get a new sense of energy to solve your troubles.
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: If life gives you lemons, make lemonade. In simple terms, think of the lessons you can learn from a tough situation.
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: Shut off the past! Let the dead past bury its dead. Shut out yesterdays have lighted fools the way to dusty death.
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: Every day is a new life to a wise man.
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: One of the most tragic things I know about human nature is that all of us tend to put off living. We are all dreaming of some magical rose garden over the horizon – instead of enjoying the roses that are blooming outside our windows today.
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: True peace of mind comes from accepting the worst. Psychologically, it means a release of energy.
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: Remind yourself of the exorbitant price you can pay for worry in terms of your health. Those who do not know how to fight worry die young.
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: If a man will devote his time to securing facts in an impartial, objective way, his worries will usually evaporate in the light of knowledge.
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: It is the failure to arrive at a fixed purpose, the inability to stop going round and round in maddening circles, that drives men to nervous breakdowns and living hells.
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: Worry is most apt to ride you ragged not when you are in action, but when the day’s work is done. Your imagination can run riot then and bring up all sorts of ridiculous possibilities and magnify each little blunder.
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: The remedy for worry is to get completely occupied doing something constructive.
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: We must accept and cooperate with the inevitable.
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: Good thinking deals with causes and effects, which leads to logical, constructive planning. Whereas, bad thinking frequently leads to tensions and nervous breakdowns.
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: When worrying about a problem: Ask yourself the following: What is the worst that can possibly happen? Prepare to accept the worst-case scenario if you have to. Then calmly proceed to improve on the worst outcome which you have already mentally agreed to accept.
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: Half the worry in the world is caused by people trying to make decisions before they have sufficient knowledge on which to base a decision. Tips to assist in arriving at a decision include: Gathering facts, analysing, understanding facts and ultimately arriving at a decision and acting on that decision.
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: Writing down your troubles helps a lot in clarifying them. Write the following about your problems: What am I worried about? What can I do about it? Deciding what to do and starting immediately to carry out that decision.
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: Problem-solving: What is the problem? What is the cause of the problem? What are ALL the possible solutions to the problem? Pick the best solution out of all possible solutions.
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: Keep busy. Although in this day of the hustle and bustle, The worried person must lose him/herself in action lest be wither in despair. AKA: Keep yourself occupied by doing something productive or beneficial for your growth.
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: Life is too short to belittle and to be upset by trivial things we should forget about. Do the issues occurring now affect or matter to you in the next 5 minutes, days, months, years, and so on?
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: Let’s ask ourselves: What are the chances, according to the law of averages, that this event I am worrying about will ever occur? Where the law of averages = the supposed principle that future events are likely to turn out so that they balance any past deviation from a presumed average.
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: If something is inevitable, unavoidable or out of your control, forget the worry and accept the outcome. E.g., Death
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: So why waste the tears? Of course, we have all been guilty of blunders and absurdities. So what? Who has not? AKA: What has happened, happened. You can’t change the past, but you can change your future.
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: Our mental attitude is the factor that determines our fate. A man is what he thinks about all day long.
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: Eight words that can determine your destiny: Our life is what our thoughts make it. When faced with difficulties, assume a positive attitude instead of a negative one.
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: Concern VS Worry: Concern = Realising what the problems are and calmly taking steps to meet them. Worry = Going around in futile circles.
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: The mind is its own place, and in itself can make a heaven of Hell, a hell of Heaven.
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: When we try to seek revenge to get even with our enemies, we will hurt ourselves far more than we hurt them. Never waste a minute thinking about people we don’t like.
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: An angry man is always full of poison.
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: Gratitude is a cultivated trait and must be trained. The way of happiness is to not expect gratitude but to help or give for the joy of it.
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: All the days of our years we have been living in a fairyland of beauty, but we have been too blind to see, too satiated to enjoy. AKA: Count your blessings and not your troubles.
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: Find yourself and be yourself, there is no-one else on earth like you. Avoid misery on yourself by avoiding fitting a pattern which you don’t conform to.
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: Instead of indulging in self-pity, learn from your mistakes or misfortunes. Train your mind to think of turning a minus into a plus.
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: Forget yourself by becoming interested in others. Do goods deed that will put joy on someone’s face.
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: When you are good to others, you are best to yourself.
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: Very often, when you are being criticised unreasonably, it is because it gives the other party a feeling of importance. It usually means that others are jealous that you are accomplishing something worthy of their attention to belittle you.
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: Many people get a sense of satisfaction for denouncing those who are better or more successful than them.
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: To improve continuously, since we can’t hope to be perfect, learn to ask for honest, helpful and constructive criticism.
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: Fatigue often produces worry, to prevent fatigue and worry: rest often and rest before you get tired. AKA: Resting is the most underrated life hack.
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: Emotional exertion usually has far more to do with producing worry, frustration and resentment, compared to physical exertion.
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: If you enjoy what you are doing, you may work long hours, but it won’t seem like work at all. It will look like play.
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: A man can succeed at almost anything for which he has unlimited enthusiasm.
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: Stay out of work or activities where the chances are only one out of ten of being able to make a living.
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: Ask individuals or friends working in the industry you are interested in joining to obtain further information before deciding to devote your life to it.
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: Tracking and keeping tabs on your expenses
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: Set your budget
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: Spending money wisely
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: Manage your personal finances
data.author: Dale Carneige

data.quote: Create passive or alternate sources of income
data.author: Dale Carneige
